page.title: 15Employment
page.content: {A SURVEY OF JOBS OF PARENTS OF OUR {SCHOOLCHILDREN. 42 fathers work,1 is unemployed and 22 mothers work. Of the men,five own or manage a farm,9 work on the land,6 are self- employed,3 work in a factory,3 in a bank or office and 1 is unemployed. 4 men are teachers.Of the rest there is a company director,shopkeeper, fireman,railworker,antique dealer, research engineer,consultant,health inspector,barrister,lorry driver, publican and carpenter. Of the mothers who work,8 are cleaners,4 are teachers,4 work in an office or bank; and of the rest there is one who has a hairdressing business and there is a magistrate,a careers adviser,a radiologist,a school dinner helper and one who works on a farm.
